I really wish the manufacturer would figure out a more secure way to attach the embellishments because It’s really pretty otherwise.  The fit was OK. I’m a 36D and ordered a XXL. I probably could’ve ordered an XL as the cup size is a bit large, as is the area under the armpit.  I am likely returning it. I ordered a different style, so hopefully that one is constructed better. If not, I guess I have to find something else to wear New Year’s Eve.

Again, this is very cute with the other shirt on top. There isn’t any stretch, as it’s a corset. It’s flattering, with the exception of my boobs. It didn’t pinch or dig into my skin, so I’d say it would be comfortable to wear for an evening out.
